column2: For the first time in generations the Kingdom of Hyrule has been united under one ruler, Gustaf Hyrule. The Gerudos have been pushed back to their deserts. The Duchess of Saria declares her intentions of pushing the moblins out of their boarders and forging a kingdom to last till the end of time. Around the world the seperated tribes of humanity are forging their own kingdoms. The Era of Chaos is at and end and so too is the Era of Monster and the Lost Tribes supremacy over the world.
